FIFA 20: the notes of Real Madrid players




It's a new career opening up to him. After a sparkling career as a player, Ronaldo Nazario then hung up the crampons, finally turning to a new horizon. The Brazilian did not want to try the adventure as a coach is now invested in the club presidency, he practices at Real Valladolid.
But the former Bar√ßa and Real Madrid does not intend to stop there. After Spain, Ronaldo is looking to invest in a new championship, as he revealed on Wednesday.




"I searched England"




Ronaldo + 29 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"I am currently looking for a club to buy, I have been looking for England in the second division, the Premier League is too expensive and the second division is too expensive." and I'm always looking for Portugal ... "he tells Web Summit. While waiting to see Cristiano Ronaldo return to the country one day, the Portuguese could soon host one of the other historic players of the sport.
